label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_027
content:
## 2024-09-02 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 126
- Active: 118
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 42
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 8

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 30
- Mid Dose: 31
- High Dose: 31
- Placebo: 34

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 49.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 19.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 82.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 130.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 85.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 22.0
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 84.9
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 30.8
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 124.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 182.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 137.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 32.9
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 106.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 168.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 271.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 181.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 44.2
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 14.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.7
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 14.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 23.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 1.3

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 38.5
- Erythema Percentage: 22.4
- Swelling Percentage: 13.6
- Induration Percentage: 3.1
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 29.0

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 12.8
- Fatigue Percentage: 40.2
- Myalgia Percentage: 20.0
- Headache Percentage: 24.6
- Chills Percentage: 11.6

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.1
- WBC (K) SD: 1.9
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 33.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 6.8
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 51.7
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 9.7
- Platelets (K) Mean: 226
- Platelets (K) SD: 43
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 1.8
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.4
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2770, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2712, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2707, Description: myalgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2768, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2721, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Vaccine lot VX-944 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range
- Site 01 monitoring visit, 0 minor findings

### Notes
- Week 27: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 126 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
